ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: nor are cool shade and fierce heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor shade and heat of sunshine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: nor cool shade and torrid heat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And neither are the shadow and the hot sunshine!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor are the shade and the sun's heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor the shade and the heat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the shade and the torrid heat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nor is the shadow equal with the sun's full heat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: shade and heat are not alike,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: - Nor the shade and the sun's heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor are the (chilly) shade and the (genial) heat of the sun:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor are (alike) the shade and the sun's heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The shade and the hot wind are not equal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor are the shade and the torrid heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor are the shade and the heat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:21] nor shade and torrid heat, namely, Paradise and the Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 492 (Nor is the shadow equal with the sun's full heat) nor is Paradise equal to the Fire;
